rows.label: qev014401_MSG0001
rows.name:
It's not FAIR! I've produced way more results than that...
that little... Aaaargh! This is discrimination![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0002
rows.name:
HEY! You! I don't know who you are, but you're going
to sit there and listen to me carp about my problems![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0011
rows.name: Listen to Rosie's story.

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0021
rows.name: Find something better to do.

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Right then. Deep breath... *huuuuuuuuuff*
And out... *pfffffeeeeewwwww*
Okay! Here we go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh no, you don't! If I don't get this off my chest,
I'll explode—and that would make you a MURDERER!
So unless you enjoy prison, I suggest you listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0005
rows.name:
So my research team has been working on a water-
purification facility in Biahno—outside the city—and we
FINALLY finished it. I know, right? Party time, woooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0006
rows.name:
BUT! Party time canceled, booooo! Because then
everyone had to move out to the site...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0007
rows.name:
AND THEY DIDN'T INVITE ME! And then! THEN!
Then I hear this other girl on the team, Ajoa?
She just got PROMOTED![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0008
rows.name:
How does THAT make sense? It's discrimination!
I would TOTALLY win if I sued them, right?
I hope a lawyer made it onto the White Whale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0030
rows.name: Console

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree with Rosie that it sounds unfair.

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0040
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Rosie if her personality had anything to do with it.

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm glad SOMEONE gets it! This is a total travesty.
It's the worst thing to happen to anyone in, like, the
last five YEARS! ...Well, except for Earth blowing up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0010
rows.name:
EXCUSE me? I have a WONDERFUL personality,
and I will CRUSH YOU if you say otherwise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0011
rows.name:
No, I know what this is all about. Ajoa's just a tiiiny
bit cuter than me, so they took her instead. It's gross![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm sure Ajoa's "hard at work" now, frolicking with Ian
and the others on their happy little lakeside vacation.
Probably tanning and swimming and...uh...eating chips.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0013
rows.name:
They haven't even bothered with their daily check-in for
days. THAT'S how good of a time they're having![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0014
rows.name: It's abuse of office, and I WON'T STAND FOR IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0015
rows.name:
So listen, I need you to go there and catch them
slacking. Oh, and feel free to be extra mean to
Ajoa if you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Seriously. Just go over there and let them have it.
Line them all up, then run down the line, slapping their
faces with your open hand. And tell 'em it's from Rosie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm trusting you to head on over to that Biahno water-
purification plant and turn their little lakeside paradise
into a living hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0018
rows.name:
The Biahno water-purification plant is west of the city.
Oh, and there's probably some dangerous monsters
blah blah. Whatever. You can handle it if THEY can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well? How'd it go? Did you slap the lazy out of 'em?
...Did Ajoa cry? I want details. And pictures![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0020
rows.name: Wh-what? Everyone but Ajoa was... They're dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0021
rows.name:
And she had an...egg? Inside her body?
And it's being surgically removed as we speak?
...No. No, that's simply not possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0050
rows.name: Prove

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0051
rows.name: Show Rosie the researchers' ID cards as proof.

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0060
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Rosie if she's happy that Ajoa is suffering.

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh God... Oh God, no... This is...
They were my friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Shut up! They were my FRIENDS!
Of COURSE I'm not happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm going to check on Ajoa.
...Here. This is for saving her life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well? How'd it go? Did you slap the lazy out of 'em?
...Did Ajoa cry? I want details. And pictures![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0026
rows.name: Wh-what? Everyone but Ajoa was... They're dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0027
rows.name:
And she had an...egg? Inside her body?
And she turned into a monster?
...No. No, that's simply not possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0070
rows.name: Prove

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0071
rows.name: Show Rosie one of the researchers' ID cards as proof.

rows.label: qev014401_JNK0080
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev014401_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Rosie if she's happy that Ajoa suffered.

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oh God... Oh God, no... This is...
They were my friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0029
rows.name: This is my fault... Because I wanted Ajoa to suffer...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Shut up! They were my FRIENDS!
Of COURSE I'm not happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0031
rows.name:
But... But it's still my fault... Because you're right.
I wanted her to suffer. I did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0032
rows.name: What have I done...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0033
rows.name:
It should have been me. I'm already a monster inside,
after all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014401_MSG0034
rows.name:
Here. This is for your time. I'm...
Oh God, I'm so sorry. Forgive me, Ajoa...[ST:wait ]
